briefdescription.para: BB ticks to microseconds (no conversion required).
Typical maximum duration to scan in a scan interval (BbRtCfg_t::maxScanPeriodMs).
Typical operation setup delay in microseconds (BbRtCfg_t::schSetupDelayUs).
Maximum time tick for 32 bit timer(1MHz) in microseconds (BbRtCfg_t::schSetupDelayUs).
Maximum time tick for 32 bit timer(8MHz) in microseconds (BbRtCfg_t::schSetupDelayUs).
Maximum time tick for 24 bit RTC counter(32768Hz) in microseconds.

detaileddescription.para: Non-protocol specific operation.
Bluetooth Low Energy normal mode.
Bluetooth Low Energy direct test mode.
Enable the continuous PRBS15 transmit sequence.
Number of protocols.
Operation successful.
General failure.
Receive canceled.
Receive packet timeout.
Receive packet with CRC verification failed.
Receive packet with frame verification failed.
Receive packet with MIC verification failed.
ACK packet failure.
ACK packet timeout.
Transmit CCA failure.
Transmit failure.
Received packet with AA verification failed.
Received packet with Sounding Sequence or Random Sequence verification failed.
Bluetooth Low Energy 1Mbps PHY.
Bluetooth Low Energy 2Mbps PHY.
Bluetooth Low Energy Coded PHY (data coding unspecified).
Bluetooth Low Energy 2Mbps 2BT PHY (for Channel Sounding only).
BB defined PHY Options behavior.
Always use S=2 coding when transmitting on LE Coded PHY.
Always use S=8 coding when transmitting on LE Coded PHY.
One-time initialization of baseband resources. This routine can be used to setup baseband resources, load RF trim parameters and execute RF calibrations and seed the random number generator.
This routine should block until the BB hardware is completely initialized.
This routine brings the BB hardware out of low power (enable power and clocks) just before a first BB operation is executed.
This routine signals the BB hardware to go into low power (disable power and clocks) after all BB operations have been disabled.

briefdescription.para: Get the current BB clock value in microseconds.

detaileddescription.para:
Current BB clock value, units are microseconds.
This routine reads the current value from the BB clock and returns its value.

briefdescription.para: Called to register a protocol's Radio and Timer IRQ callback functions.
